meanings.definition: The time of day when the sun is highest in the sky; midday.
meanings.sent1: During the noontides, the sun shines brightly overhead.
meanings.sent2: Let's have lunch at noontides today.
meanings.sent3: At noontides, the sleepy cat woke up and stretched lazily.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement reached its noontides when she saw the surprise party.
meanings.sent5: The noontides heat made the pavement shimmer like a mirage.

meanings.definition: The highest point or culmination of something.
meanings.sent1: The success of the project reached its noontides with the final presentation.
meanings.sent2: The tension in the room peaked at noontides during the intense debate.
meanings.sent3: The noontides of the movie was when the unexpected plot twist was revealed.
meanings.sent4: His anger rose to its noontides when he discovered the betrayal.
meanings.sent5: The cheers from the crowd at the concert reached their noontides during the encore performance.
